zh-cn: 德怀特·戴维·艾森豪威尔

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将，军事家、政治家，曾任第34任美国总统。第二次世界大战期间，他担任盟军在欧洲的最高指挥官。
description.en: An American military officer and statesman who served as the 34th president of the United States. He was a five-star general in the United States Army and served as Supreme Commander of the Allied Expeditionary Force in Europe during World War II.

description.zh-cn: 美国第33任总统。
description.en: 33rd President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家，曾任美国副总统及第37任总统。
description.en: An American politician who served as Vice President and the 37th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国第35任总统。
description.en: 35th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国军事家、政治家、外交家，曾任美国陆军参谋长。
description.en: An American soldier, statesman, and diplomat, who served as Chief of Staff of the United States Army.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将，曾任美国陆军参谋长。
description.en: An American five-star general and Field Marshal of the Philippine Army who was Chief of Staff of the United States Army.

description.zh-cn: 德怀特·艾森豪威尔的妻子，美国第一夫人。
description.en: Wife of Dwight D. Eisenhower and First Lady of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国共和党参议员，艾森豪威尔在1952年总统选举中的党内竞争对手。
description.en: A Republican U.S. Senator and Eisenhower's intra-party rival in the 1952 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国共和党参议员，以其激烈的反共主张和麦卡锡主义闻名。
description.en: A Republican U.S. Senator known for his aggressive anti-communist stances and McCarthyism.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物及军事家，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Chinese political and military leader who served as the leader of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国法学家和政治家，被艾森豪威尔任命为第14任美国首席大法官。
description.en: An American jurist and politician who was appointed by Eisenhower as the 14th Chief Justice of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的国家元首和政府首脑。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of the United States of America.

description.zh-cn: 美国武装力量的陆上军种。
description.en: The land service branch of the United States Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 美国第一所军事学校，位于纽约州西点。
description.en: The first military academy in the United States, located in West Point, New York.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约市曼哈顿的世界顶级私立研究型大学。
description.en: A private Ivy League research university in New York City.

description.zh-cn: 美国两大主要政党之一。
description.en: One of the two major contemporary political parties in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲和北美国家为实现防御合作而创建的国际军事集团。
description.en: An intergovernmental military alliance between European and North American countries.

description.zh-cn: 一个存在于1922年至1991年的欧亚大陆北部的主义联邦制社会主义国家。
description.en: A socialist state in Northern Eurasia that existed from 1922 to 1991.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的共和国，艾森豪威尔政府承认其为代表全中国的唯一合法政府。
description.en: A republic in East Asia, recognized by the Eisenhower administration as the sole legitimate government of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府的一个行政性科研机构，负责制定、实施美国的民用太空计划与开展航空科学暨空间科学研究。
description.en: An independent agency of the U.S. federal government responsible for the civilian space program, as well as aeronautics and space research.

description.zh-cn: 指1953年至1969年，厄尔·沃伦担任美国首席大法官期间的美国最高法院。该时期的判决在美国历史上掀起了一场自由主义的宪政革命。
description.en: Refers to the Supreme Court of the United States from 1953 to 1969, when Earl Warren served as Chief Justice. Its rulings led to a liberal constitutional revolution in U.S. history.

description.zh-cn: 美国的国家级公路系统，其建设由艾森豪威尔政府大力推动。
description.en: A network of controlled-access highways in the United States, its construction was championed by the Eisenhower administration.

description.zh-cn: 一场全球性的战争，艾森豪威尔在此期间担任盟军在欧洲的最高指挥官。
description.en: A global war during which Eisenhower served as the Supreme Commander of the Allied Expeditionary Force in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 美国和苏联及其各自盟友之间的地缘政治紧张时期。艾森豪威尔的总统任期是冷战的关键时期。
description.en: A period of geopolitical tension between the United States and the Soviet Union and their respective allies. Eisenhower's presidency was a key period of the Cold War.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪50年代初，在美国出现的指控他人不忠、颠覆或叛国，但没有适当证据的政治迫害行为。艾森豪威尔暗中反对麦卡锡主义。
description.en: The practice of making accusations of subversion or treason without proper regard for evidence in the United States during the early 1950s. Eisenhower covertly opposed McCarthyism.

description.zh-cn: 1956年发生在埃及的一场国际武装冲突，艾森豪威尔政府谴责了英法以的军事行动。
description.en: An international armed conflict in Egypt in 1956, in which the Eisenhower administration condemned the military actions of Britain, France, and Israel.

description.zh-cn: 1962年冷战时期在美国、苏联与古巴之间爆发的一场极其严重的政治、军事危机。肯尼迪总统曾就此咨询艾森豪威尔。
description.en: A major confrontation in 1962 that brought the United States and the Soviet Union close to war over the presence of Soviet nuclear-armed missiles in Cuba. President Kennedy consulted Eisenhower during the crisis.

description.zh-cn: 1954年美国与中华民国在华盛顿签署的军事防御条约，由艾森豪威尔政府推动签订。
description.en: A mutual defense pact signed between the United States and the Republic of China in 1954, promoted and signed by the Eisenhower administration.

description.zh-cn: 美国民权运动时期通过的第一部联邦民权法案，由艾森豪威尔总统签署。
description.en: The first federal civil rights legislation passed during the Civil Rights Movement, signed into law by President Eisenhower.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国德克萨斯州格雷森县的一座城市，是德怀特·艾森豪威尔的出生地。
description.en: A city in Grayson County, Texas, United States, and the birthplace of Dwight D. Eisenhower.

position.en: General of the Army, Chief of Staff of the Army

description.zh-cn: 随麦克阿瑟来到菲律宾担任菲律宾政府军事顾问。
description.en: Accompanied MacArthur to the Philippines to serve as a military advisor to the Philippine government.

description.zh-cn: 在珍珠港事件后，于陆军参谋长马歇尔领导的总参谋部任职，并受其赏识。
description.en: After the attack on Pearl Harbor, he served in the General Staff under Chief of Staff Marshall, who appreciated his abilities.

description.zh-cn: 杜鲁门总统委任艾森豪威尔为美国陆军参谋长。
description.en: President Truman appointed Eisenhower as Chief of Staff of the United States Army.

description.zh-cn: 担任首位北大西洋公约组织最高指挥官。
description.en: Served as the first Supreme Commander of NATO.

description.zh-cn: 艾森豪威尔参加1952年总统选举的主要意图之一是阻止其党内竞争对手塔夫脱当选后推行孤立主义政策。
description.en: One of Eisenhower's primary motivations for running in the 1952 presidential election was to prevent his party rival, Taft, from implementing isolationist policies.

description.zh-cn: 在艾森豪威尔担任总统期间任其副总统。
description.en: Served as Vice President during Eisenhower's presidency.

description.zh-cn: 延续承认中华民国为代表全中国的唯一合法政府，并于1954年与其签订《中美共同防御条约》。
description.en: Continued to recognize the Republic of China as the sole legitimate government of China and signed the Sino-American Mutual Defense Treaty with it in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 该条约旨在保卫台澎金马，稳固美国与中华民国的邦谊。
description.en: The treaty aimed to defend Taiwan, Penghu, Kinmen, and Matsu, solidifying the alliance between the US and the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 在国内暗中反对约瑟夫·麦卡锡参议员过于激烈的反共主张，为麦卡锡主义时代的结束做出了一定的贡献。
description.en: Covertly opposed Senator Joseph McCarthy's extreme anti-communist stances, contributing to the end of the McCarthy era.

description.zh-cn: 签署并通过了1957年《民权法案》，该法案禁止学校实施种族隔离制度。
description.en: Signed and passed the Civil Rights Act of 1957, which prohibited racial segregation in schools.

description.zh-cn: 签署了1956年的相关法案，为州际公路系统的发展确认了法源与基金。
description.en: Signed the relevant 1956 acts, which established the legal and financial foundation for the development of the Interstate Highway System.

description.zh-cn: 在苏联于1957年成功发射人造卫星后，艾森豪威尔随即授权建立美国国家航空航天局。
description.en: After the Soviet Union successfully launched Sputnik in 1957, Eisenhower authorized the establishment of NASA.

description.zh-cn: 于任内访问中华民国台北市，与时任总统蒋中正会面。
description.en: Visited Taipei, Republic of China during his presidency and met with then-President Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 在古巴导弹危机期间，应时任总统肯尼迪的请求，与其会谈商讨应对方案。
description.en: During the Cuban Missile Crisis, at the request of then-President Kennedy, he met with him to discuss response strategies.

description.zh-cn: 任命厄尔·沃伦为美国最高法院第14任首席大法官。
description.en: Appointed Earl Warren as the 14th Chief Justice of the United States Supreme Court.

description.zh-cn: 沃伦法院频频作出倾向自由派的判决，这与艾森豪威尔的温和保守派立场相悖，他后称提名沃伦是“一生中所犯的最愚蠢的错误”。
description.en: The Warren Court frequently issued liberal rulings, contrary to Eisenhower's moderate conservative stance, leading him to later call Warren's nomination 'the biggest damn-fool mistake I ever made'.

description.zh-cn: 在总统任内推行冷战政策，以遏制苏联共产主义的扩张。
description.en: During his presidency, he implemented Cold War policies to contain the expansion of Soviet communism.
